front.title: Multimedia Conference Recording Use Cases and Requirements

abstract.t: The current work of SIPREC will soon finish. As conferences are the key requirement for some environments, it is worth to explore several extensions and additional functionalities to support multimedia conference recording. SIPREC is not sufficient to record all the conference sessions via certain interactive media channels, like multi-user chat or screen sharing. This draft tries to show the use cases for multimedia conference recording and the requirements for how to work well under SIPREC mechanism.
